para.dtcname: Open or Short in Master Cylinder Pressure Sensor
Master Cylinder Pressure Sensor Zero Point Low Malfunction
Master Cylinder Pressure Sensor Output Malfunction
Master Cylinder Pressure Sensor Internal Malfunction

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Open or Short in Master Cylinder Pressure Sensor

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: Any of the following is detected:

item.ptxt: When voltage at terminal +BS is 9.5 V or higher, power supply voltage of master cylinder pressure sensor is continuously low for 1 second or more.

When master cylinder pressure sensor power supply voltage has risen, master cylinder pressure sensor has overheated or overcurrent of master cylinder pressure sensor continues for 0.1 seconds or more.
When +BS terminal voltage is 9.5 to 17.4 V, there is no communication with master cylinder pressure sensor continuously for 0.1 seconds or more.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: Brake actuator assembly (Master cylinder pressure sensor)

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Master Cylinder Pressure Sensor Zero Point Low Malfunction

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure is below -0.744 MPa (-7.6 kgf/cm2, -107 psi) for 5 seconds or more.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: Brake actuator assembly (Master cylinder pressure sensor)

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Master Cylinder Pressure Sensor Output Malfunction

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: Any of the following is detected:

item.ptxt: When vehicle speed is 7 km/h (4.3 mph) or more and master cylinder pressure exceeds 1.764 MPa (18.0 kgf/cm2, 255 psi), master cylinder pressure does not increase 0.048 MPa (0.5 kgf/cm2, 6.9 psi) or more continuously for 60 seconds.

When vehicle speed is 7 km/h (4.3 mph) and master cylinder pressure is 2.45 MPa (25.0 kgf/cm2, 355 psi) or more, master cylinder pressure does not increase 0.048 MPa (0.5 kgf/cm2, 6.9 psi) or more continuously for 30 seconds.
Master cylinder pressure does not increase 0.048 MPa (0.5 kgf/cm2, 6.9 psi) or more 5 times or more while vehicle speed decreases from 40 km/h (25 mph) to 0 km/h (0 mph).
When vehicle speed is 10 km/h (6 mph) or more, noise in master cylinder pressure value occurs 7 times or more in 5 seconds.

When vehicle speed is 7 km/h (4.3 mph) or more, braking is performed (stop light switch assembly is ON) and master cylinder pressure differential value is below 20 MPa/s, difference between master cylinder pressure estimated from vehicle deceleration and master cylinder pressure sensor input value is large for 1 second or more 5 times or more.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: Brake actuator assembly (Master cylinder pressure sensor)

data-name.name: dtc-code
data-name.ptxt: C142A

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Master Cylinder Pressure Sensor Internal Malfunction

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: Either of the following is detected:

item.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure is 23.328 MPa (237.8 kgf/cm2, 3382 psi) or more continuously for 0.1 seconds.
Master cylinder temperature is 150°C (302°F) or more continuously for 0.1 seconds.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: Brake actuator assembly (Master cylinder pressure sensor)

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Master Cylinder Output Value Malfunction

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure sensor invalid condition continues for 0.2 seconds or more.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: Brake actuator assembly (Master cylinder pressure sensor)

atten3.ptxt: When replacing the skid control ECU (brake actuator assembly), perform zero point calibration and store system information.

test1.ptxt: Replace the brake actuator assembly (master cylinder pressure sensor).
